DOC.brief_summary: High-protein meal previously show acutely reduce appetite energy intake . More recently , meal higher calcium also show increase feeling fullness , circulate insulin intestinal peptide concentration reduce appetite sensation . This study aim ass whether calcium protein act synergistically acutely influence appetite energy intake .
DOC.brief_title: The Acute , Synergistic Effects Protein Calcium Appetite Energy Intake
DOC.criteria: Male Female BMI 18.529.9 kg/m2 Age : 1840 year Smokers Food allergy Metabolic disorder ( ie . type 2 diabetes )
